CustomField.formula: IF( AND( TEXT(Region__c) != 'Inland Empire', TEXT(Region__c) != 'Chicago', TEXT(Region__c) != '' ), '', IF( AND( TEXT(Region__c) == 'Inland Empire', LOWER(Property_County__c) == LOWER('Orange County') || LOWER(Property_County__c) == LOWER('Orange') ), 'Orange County', IF( TEXT(Region__c) == 'Inland Empire', 'Inland Empire', IF( TEXT(Region__c) == 'Chicago', IF( LOWER( Property_State__r.Name) == LOWER('IL') , 'IL' , IF( LOWER(Property_State__r.Name) == LOWER('MN'), 'MN' , IF( LOWER(Property_State__r.Name) == LOWER('WI'), 'WI', 'Other' ) ) ), '' ) ) ) )
CustomField.label: Subregion
